channel.title: Is it possible?
channel.description: Is it possible in any way, to split files to reduce lag? When my server gets over 20 players, and they all start attacking npc's.. it gets really laggy, i think it is cause i use only one autospawn, so i split that already. But can you split other big .cfg's too in the same way as you do with Autospawn?. Thanks in advance ~System79.

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

I have 4,3GBit connection, and i already fixed the problem, thanks though.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

This isn’t an argument about who has the fastest PC. He needs help, so both shut up.

Your internet connection is probably to small to accomodate more than 20 players. Splitting files wont help you reduce lag. The best you can do, is make sure you don’t have any internet using programs up, when running your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

System79:

Excuse me? Shit pc? Shut up, i have probably one pretty much faster than yours.

Umm … I don’t see how it wouldn’t reduce lag… I split my item.cfg, about .450mb each and it seems to help a little

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

Excuse me? Shit pc? Shut up, i have probably one pretty much faster than yours.

item.title: Is it possible?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It’s because you got a shit pc.

Remove the logfiles.

“Splitting” the files dosent do anything…its just more files to load, and after all, its still the same ammount of code.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it possible?

item.description:
@System79 wrote:

Is it possible in any way, to split files to reduce lag?
When my server gets over 20 players, and they all start attacking npc’s… it gets really laggy, i think it is cause i use only one autospawn, so i split that already.
But can you split other big .cfg’s too in the same way as you do with Autospawn?.
Thanks in advance
